/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban landscape and the natural elements within it.
